articles.description: When people had more variability in their physical location--visiting more locations in a day and spending proportionately equitable time across these locations--they reported feeling more positive.
articles.content:
Researchers have found that new and diverse experiences are linked to enhanced happiness, and this relationship is associated with a greater correlation of brain activity.
The results, published in the journal Nature Neuroscience, reveal a previously unknown… [+2889 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus treatment: Researchers find BP drug, if given in early stages, can reduce COVID-19 mortality risk - Times Now
articles.description: Blood pressure drug Prazosin can reduce the risk of cytokine storm - a leading cause of death among COVID-19 patients. Researchers warn that the drug should be given in the early stages of infection.

articles.title: Covid treatment: HCQ shows some promise, finds Telangana government report - Livemint
articles.description: Over 70% of healthcare workers who were administered HCQ on a trial basis reported no onset of symptoms of coronavirus.Hydroxychloroquine or HCQ as it is commonly called is an anti-malarial drug that is also used to treat other autoimmune diseases
